discourse_list.title: Is Uniswap NFT aggregator still a thing

content.content: been silent for awhile, no updates, sweeping fee are quite terrible compared to gem & blur - or the team just put this one on hold, it’s completely nothing ngl
content.GPT-summary: The post is asking a question about the status of the Uniswap NFT aggregator and expressing disappointment with the lack of updates and high fees compared to other options. The post also gives negative feedback on the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving negative feedback on proposal
